name: Little Worlds
description:
Install instructions

For the Ludum Dare build

The file "Little Worlds.zip" contains all necessary files to run the game. To run the game, the executable file and data folder must be in the same directory. This is the final build for the Ludum Dare 38. Please consult the README.

For the Non-Ludum Dare build:

The file "Non-Ludum-Build.zip" (if present) is a build still in development. That build is not for the ludum dare and will have features from after the dare's submission deadline. Please consult the README.
